column4: Hello all, whats the best dvd player for Ubuntu ? I want one that can show menus
have you tried the one you've got? The next would be VLC.
yes I tried both, VLC cannot select from menus :/ and sometimes the dvd is split into many VOBs which is a problem playing with VLC where I have to play each one of them separately
bummer, sorry no other ideas. Nothing on google?
